text: From Houston PC Art Acevedo's press conference today. This is fine. But the problem is forced entry. If "knock-and-announce" doesn't allow for reasonable time before door comes down, it's no different than -- and poses the same risks as -- a no-knock.

text: Clarence Thomas' first question in three years yesterday was some weak-sauce whataboutism. His question also revealed that he hadn't bothered to learn how preemptory challenges work in Mississippi -- a pretty crucial part of understanding the case.  https://www.supremecourt.gov/oral_arguments/argument_transcripts/2018/17-9572_2c83.pdf …

text: One defining characteristic of the Trump era is the end of shame. Shamelessness is now a prerequisite for success in politics. And you can make a good argument that the road to today began with the  lack of a reckoning for the supporters and architects of the Iraq war.
